banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: For women in pursuit of motherhood and a career
videoData.socialTitle: For women in pursuit of motherhood and a career

nodes.whoTheyAre: Irene Mora began her career as a Junior Auditor in Deloitte. Not long after, she decided to pursue her dream job in the fashion industry and started working for Calvin Klein. As part of the Spanish merchandising team, she is in charge of getting the right merchandise to the right place at the right time. Irene is a citizen of the world, having lived in Madrid, Chicago, New Jersey and Barcelona.

videoData.description: Irene Mora credits her own ambition and drive to her mother, the successful CEO of a multinational company. From her unique childhood -- hopping around the world and being exposed to new environments -- Mora learned valuable skills that later informed and helped her excel in business, including adaptability, authenticity and independence. Mora encourages mothers to pursue a family and a career -- their kids may just thank them for it.
